channel.title: [525] Couple of Questions
channel.description:
Hi all,
Well im good at coding 317, i know basics at 508... but 525 is confusing me.
After running 317, and 508 for a while, i decided to switch to 525.
but I cant even find the right file to make myself admin, and i would have no idea where to search next. Also, i would like to know how to change PvP drops, with that i mean, how to add my custom drops to the PvP list?
Thanks for reading, And if you know, please post youre answer.
Please dont flame, i know this sounds nooby, but seriously im completely new to 525.
(im using w00tsc4p3 source!)
~Eijsvogel.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 12:07:01 pm[/size][hr]*BUMP*
